series_description: This series documents the agendas and material provided in support of meetings of the Council and its subordinate workgroups.
retention_statement: Retain 3 years after meeting, then destroy.

series_description: This series documents the actions of the Council on Technology Services (COTS).
retention_statement: Retain in agency 5 years, then transfer records, in paper or microfilm format, to the , Library of Virginia for permanent retention.

series_description: This series documents the final reports of the Council that were submitted to the Governor and/or General Assembly for final action.
retention_statement: Retain in agency 5 years, then transfer records, in paper or microfilm formats, to the , Library of Virginia for permanent retention.

series_description: This series documents the final reports of the Council's work groups as sent to the Council and/or posted on the Council's Web site.
retention_statement: Retain in agency 5 years, then transfer records, in paper or microfilm format, to the , Library of Virginia for permanent retention.

series_description: This series documents a snapshot of the Council's Web site, as it appeared at a period of time.
retention_statement: In December of each year take an electronic snapshot of the site as it exists at that time. Store snapshot off-line in a suitable format. Retain snapshot 5 years after end of related calendar year, then destroy.
